con:config.con:query:
SELECT T.TRANSACTIONSID , M.MESSAGEID, P.PAYMENTINFOID, P.PMTINFOID, M.AGREEMENTID, T.ENDTOENDID , T.INSTRUCTIONID, T.PAYMENTTYPE, T.PAYMENTSTATUS, T.ISPC , T.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID, M.INITIATINGPARTYBICFI FROM TRANSACTIONS T,MESSAGE M, PAYMENTINFO P WHERE M.MESSAGEID = P.FK_MESSAGEID and P.PAYMENTINFOID = T.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and
M.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION in '${#TestCase#MESSAGEID}'

con:config.con:query: SELECT BUSINESSKEY, LOG_ID,BANK_ORG_ID, FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EVENT_TYPE.SUBCATEGORY, event_status FROM EVENT_LOG INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ON EVENT_LOG.FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID = EVENT_TYPE.EVENT_TYPE_ID WHERE BUSINESSKEY = '${Transactions#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' order by FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID asc
